Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: தள்ளா விளையுளும் தக்காரும் தாழ்விலாச் செல்வரும் சேர்வது நாடு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: A kingdom is that in which (those who carry on) a complete cultivation, virtuous persons, and merchants with inexhaustible wealth, dwell together.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A triptych showcasing the three pillars of an ideal nation ('நாடு').
Layered_Composition.Midground: The left panel shows a lush, green field with an unfailingly abundant harvest ('தள்ளா விளையுள்'). The central panel shows a group of virtuous, wise, and morally upright people ('தக்கார்'). The right panel shows prosperous merchants and citizens with wealth that does not diminish ('தாழ்விலாச் செல்வர்').
Layered_Composition.Background: All three panels are part of a single, harmonious, and unified landscape, showing that these three elements together constitute the ideal nation.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The definition of a great country is the coming together of three things: unfailing agricultural produce, virtuous people, and undiminishing wealth.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The three panels clearly delineate the three essential components. The abundance of each component is visually emphasized.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A bright, golden, prosperous light bathes the entire scene. The colors are rich and vibrant, signifying health, wealth, and virtue.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A wide, panoramic shot that presents the three elements as a cohesive whole.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with rich details in the landscape, people, and wealth.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Warm, golden-hour lighting to create a sense of an ideal golden age.

Flux_Optimized_Prompt.Negative_Prompt: barren fields, corrupt people, poor merchants, text artifacts, cartoonish.
